onboarding.welcomeDescription: Your all-in-one solution for managing your travel services and documents.

onboarding.stayConnectedDescription: Chat with our team and get real-time updates on your cases.
onboarding.getStartedDescription: Ready to begin? Let's get you set up and start managing your services.

getStarted.tagline: Your trusted partner for seamless travel experiences
getStarted.description: Discover a world of possibilities with our comprehensive travel services. From visa applications to travel planning, we're here to make your journey smooth and memorable.

student_visa.title: Student Visa
student_visa.description: Support for academic admissions, study permits, and university transitions.

work_permit.title: Work Permit
work_permit.description: Employment-based applications including renewals and employer sponsorship.

family_reunification.title: Family Reunification
family_reunification.description: Guidance for reunifying with loved ones through spousal or dependent visas.

tourist_visa.title: Tourist Visa
tourist_visa.description: Short-term travel visas for vacations, events, and short-stay visits.

business_visa.title: Business Visa
business_visa.description: Corporate travel, conferences, and investment-related immigration needs.

permanent_residency.title: Permanent Residency
permanent_residency.description: Long-term residency planning, eligibility assessments, and documentation.

normal.title: Normal
normal.description: Standard processing speed is fine for me.

urgent.title: Urgent
urgent.description: Critical deadline — I need immediate assistance.

payments.testMode: Test Mode: Use card 4242 4242 4242 4242 with any future date and CVC
payments.securityNotice: Your payment information is encrypted and secure
payments.paymentInfoBullets:
• Payments are processed securely through Stripe
• You will receive a receipt via email
• Refunds take 5-10 business days
• Contact support for payment issues

web.notAvailableMessage: Stripe payment processing is only available on iOS and Android devices. Please use the mobile app to complete your payment.

web.contactSupportDescription: Reach out to our support team for alternative payment methods

messages.title: Messages
messages.subtitle: Stay connected with your advisors and keep track of updates.
messages.composeSubtitle: Start a fresh conversation with your advisor via email.
messages.composeSelectCaseHint: Pick the advisor linked to the case you want to email.
messages.composeSelectAgentHint: Pick the advisor and case you want to contact via email.

messages.composeBodyHelper: Share all the context your advisor needs.

Hello advisor,

I would like to clarify the remaining steps for my application...

messages.composeNoCasesDescription: Once one of your cases is assigned to an advisor you can start an email directly from here.

profile.syncNotice: Your updates sync instantly across all your devices.

profile.securityCopy: We use industry-leading encryption to protect your personal information.
profile.passwordHint: Passwords must be at least 8 characters and include a combination of numbers and letters.
profile.deleteAccountSubtitle: Permanently remove your account and all associated data.
profile.deleteAccountWarningMessage:
This will permanently delete your account and all associated data including:

• All your cases and documents
• Your payment history
• Your messages and conversations
• Your profile information

This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteAccountInfo: If you have any pending cases or payments, please
profile.deleteAccountConfirmMessage: This action is irreversible. All your data will be permanently deleted. Continue?
profile.deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
